overview: Ivan Zaguirre, co-founder and currently CTO at Oonair, is responsible for all the technical, strategic and product direction of the product platform. Ivan has been responsible for the formation of the technical team and the R&D direction. He is a “business orientated” CTO and has assisted enormously in liaising with clients’ and operators’ technical teams. Prior to Oonair, Ivan was acting as CTO at Visual Engineering since inception in 2004. Ivan worked also in France at SONY R&D computer division which he joined after graduating with a MS in Telecommunications Engineering from the Polytechnic University of Catalonia, Barcelona.
